data.title: Demographics & Growth Reports
data.meta_description: Review important information on the demographics and growth of Victoria.
data.text:
Location Information

Nestled beside the meandering Guadalupe River, the City of Victoria is located in south central Texas just 30 miles inland from the Gulf of Mexico. Known as the "Crossroads of South Texas", three major highways intersect in Victoria: U.S. Highways 59, 77, and 87.

Major Cities Nearby

Major cities within a two hour drive include:

Austin

Corpus Christi

Houston

San Antonio

County Seat

The City of Victoria, located near the geographic center of Victoria County, is the county seat. It is the only incorporated area within Victoria County and serves as a regional center for:

Business

Educational

Entertainment services

Medical

Shopping

Square Miles

City Limits: 36.89 square miles

Extraterritorial jurisdiction (ETJ): 189.14 square miles
